name: Cresite Carnival
description: E-Summit, CRESCENT INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, flagship event, focuses on young entrepreneurs and their venture and is an entrepreneurial extravaganza filled with an insane amount of energy and enthusiasm. There is something for every one to gain and learn from complete entrepreneurship to startup founders. With more then 30 speakers, 10 startups, 25 investors and over 500 attendees, E-Summit is truly one of the finest learning opportunities for attendees and other stakeholders.

competitions.title: ON SPOT PROMOTION
competitions.description: Unleash your marketing creativity in our 'On Spot Promotion' event! Pitch a surprise product in just 8 minutes using your creative skills. Solo participants only. Are you up for the challenge?

competitions.title: Shark Tank
competitions.description:
Pitch your game-changing idea or product to potential investors! Form a team, get creative, and prepare for a 15-minute presentation with Q&A. Dive into the tank and make your pitch unforgettable!

RULES

  • Participants can form a group of 1-5 members.
  • The group must submit their idea template/actual product 20 days before the event for verification by CIIC & CISC members.
  • Once the product is approved by our team, participants will be allowed to participate.
  • Presentation/pitch time must be less than 15 minutes.
  • If investors are satisfied, discussions will be initiated.
  • Participants must have knowledge of equity share, profit, loss, and other business-related parameters of their company/product.

competitions.title: On spot promotion
competitions.description:
By participating in our mini hackathon, you'll have the chance to showcase your talents, learn from peers, and potentially win exciting prizes while contributing to the advancement of technology and innovation. We look forward to you participation and the amazing ideas that will emerge during this event.

Rules

  • Only individual participation is encouraged.
  • Participants must pitch the product provided by us on the spot.
  • There will be a time limit of 8 minutes per participant.
  • Participants must use their creative skills to pitch the product.
  • The product will be given to them an hour before the actual pitch for preparation.

competitions.title: StockMaster Challenge
competitions.description: By participating in our mini hackathon, you'll have the chance to showcase your talents, learn from peers, and potentially win exciting prizes while contributing to the advancement of technology and innovation. We look forward to you participation and the amazing ideas that will emerge during this event.

workshops.title: Inspirit sessions
workshops.description: The inspirit lecture bring you entrepreneurs from various industries to share their experiences of navigating challenges and seizing opportunities .Come and get insights and inspiration from some of the brightest minds in the startup ecosystem.

workshops.title: Startup Expo
workshops.description: Immerse yourself in a dynamic atmosphere, where innovation and creativity converge to redefine the future of industries. This Expo offers a unique platform to not only sell your groundbreaking products but also to gain valuable insights and feedback on your offerings
